mapper.select: -- F7 != '.00000000':过滤成本金额为0,不生成凭证,不过滤删除即可 SELECT CKMC, COUNT ( 1 ) AS TOTAL, CONVERT ( DECIMAL ( 18, 2 ), SUM ( CBJE ) ) CBJE FROM ( SELECT CKMC, COUNT ( 1 ) AS TOTAL, SUM ( F7 ) AS CBJE FROM ( SELECT QDMC, CKMC1, LBDM, LBMC, CKMC, SPDM, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ) F1, datepart( quarter, RQ ) F2, str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F3, str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F4, DJMC, DJBH, QYMC, FHMC, YGMC, ZDR, BZ, ZY, SPMC, PPMC, DLMC, JJMC, SPNF, BZSJ, CKJ, PIC, BYZD7, PCDM, PCMC, SUM ( SL ) F5, SUM ( BZJE ) F6, SUM ( CBJE ) F7, SUM ( JE ) F8, SUM ( CKJE ) F9 FROM ( SELECT VW_SDPHMX.RQ AS RQ, VW_SDPHMX.DJMC, VW_SDPHMX.DJBH, QUYU.QYMC, QUDAO.QDMC, CANGKU1.CKMC AS CKMC1, KEHU.LBDM, KHLB.LBMC, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, FHLX.LXMC AS FHMC, VW_SDPHMX.ZDR, VW_SDPHMX.BZ, VW_SDPHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPDM, SHANGPIN.SPMC, PINPAI.PPMC, DALEI.DLMC, JIJIE.JJMC, SHANGPIN.BYZD8 AS SPNF, VW_SDPHMX.CKJ, SHANGPIN.BZSJ AS BZSJ, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.SL ) AS SL, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.SL* SHANGPIN.BZSJ ) AS BZJE, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.JE ) AS JE, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.SL* VW_SDPHMX.DJ_3 ) AS CBJE, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.CKJ* VW_SDPHMX.SL ) AS CKJE, SHANGPIN.PIC, VW_SDPHMX.BYZD7, PICI.PCDM, PICI.PCMC FROM VW_SDPHMX LEFT JOIN FZXX ON VW_SDPHMX.FZXX= FZXX.FZDM LEFT JOIN PICI ON VW_SDPHMX.PCDM= PICI.PCDM , CANGKU AS CANGKU1, KHLB, KEHU, CANGKU, KUWEI ( NOLOCK ), SHANGPIN LEFT JOIN SHANGPIN_A ON SHANGPIN_A.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM LEFT JOIN GONGHUOSHANG ON SHANGPIN_A.GHSDM= GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM , PINPAI ( NOLOCK ), DALEI ( NOLOCK ), JIJIE ( NOLOCK ), QUDAO ( NOLOCK ), QUYU ( NOLOCK ), FHLX ( NOLOCK ), YUANGONG ( NOLOCK ) WHERE VW_SDPHMX.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM AND VW_SDPHMX.DM1= CANGKU1.CKDM AND KEHU.LBDM = KHLB.LBDM AND KEHU.CKDM= VW_SDPHMX.DM1 AND VW_SDPHMX.DM2= CANGKU.CKDM AND VW_SDPHMX.DM2_1= KUWEI.KWDM AND SHANGPIN.BYZD3= PINPAI.PPDM AND SHANGPIN.BYZD4= DALEI.DLDM AND SHANGPIN.BYZD5= JIJIE.JJDM AND QUDAO.QDDM= VW_SDPHMX.QDDM AND CANGKU1.QYDM= QUYU.QYDM AND VW_SDPHMX.YGDM= YUANGONG.YGDM AND VW_SDPHMX.DM4= FHLX.LXDM AND VW_SDPHMX.RQ BETWEEN '2019-07-23' AND '2019-08-22' GROUP BY VW_SDPHMX.RQ, VW_SDPHMX.DJMC, VW_SDPHMX.DJBH, QUYU.QYMC, QUDAO.QDMC, CANGKU1.CKMC, KEHU.LBDM, KHLB.LBMC, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, FHLX.LXMC, VW_SDPHMX.ZDR, VW_SDPHMX.BZ, VW_SDPHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPDM, SHANGPIN.SPMC, PINPAI.PPMC, DALEI.DLMC, JIJIE.JJMC, SHANGPIN.BYZD8, VW_SDPHMX.CKJ, SHANGPIN.BZSJ, SHANGPIN.PIC, VW_SDPHMX.BYZD7, PICI.PCDM, PICI.PCMC ) AS t1 GROUP BY QDMC, CKMC1, LBDM, LBMC, CKMC, SPDM, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ), datepart( quarter, RQ ), str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), DJMC, DJBH, QYMC, FHMC, YGMC, ZDR, BZ, ZY, SPMC, PPMC, DLMC, JJMC, SPNF, BZSJ, CKJ, PIC, BYZD7, PCDM, PCMC ) AS temp WHERE DJMC = '商店配货单' AND F7 != '.00000000' GROUP BY temp.CKMC, CKMC1 ) AS t2 GROUP BY t2.CKMC

-- F7 != '.00000000':过滤成本金额为0,不生成凭证,不过滤删除即可 SELECT t2.CKMC, t2.CKMC1, CBJE FROM ( SELECT CKMC, CKMC1, COUNT ( 1 ) AS TOTAL, SUM ( F7 ) AS CBJE FROM ( SELECT QDMC, CKMC1, LBDM, LBMC, CKMC, SPDM, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ) F1, datepart( quarter, RQ ) F2, str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F3, str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F4, DJMC, DJBH, QYMC, FHMC, YGMC, ZDR, BZ, ZY, SPMC, PPMC, DLMC, JJMC, SPNF, BZSJ, CKJ, PIC, BYZD7, PCDM, PCMC, SUM ( SL ) F5, SUM ( BZJE ) F6, SUM ( CBJE ) F7, SUM ( JE ) F8, SUM ( CKJE ) F9 FROM ( SELECT VW_SDPHMX.RQ AS RQ, VW_SDPHMX.DJMC, VW_SDPHMX.DJBH, QUYU.QYMC, QUDAO.QDMC, CANGKU1.CKMC AS CKMC1, KEHU.LBDM, KHLB.LBMC, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, FHLX.LXMC AS FHMC, VW_SDPHMX.ZDR, VW_SDPHMX.BZ, VW_SDPHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPDM, SHANGPIN.SPMC, PINPAI.PPMC, DALEI.DLMC, JIJIE.JJMC, SHANGPIN.BYZD8 AS SPNF, VW_SDPHMX.CKJ, SHANGPIN.BZSJ AS BZSJ, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.SL ) AS SL, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.SL* SHANGPIN.BZSJ ) AS BZJE, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.JE ) AS JE, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.SL* VW_SDPHMX.DJ_3 ) AS CBJE, SUM ( VW_SDPHMX.CKJ* VW_SDPHMX.SL ) AS CKJE, SHANGPIN.PIC, VW_SDPHMX.BYZD7, PICI.PCDM, PICI.PCMC FROM VW_SDPHMX LEFT JOIN FZXX ON VW_SDPHMX.FZXX= FZXX.FZDM LEFT JOIN PICI ON VW_SDPHMX.PCDM= PICI.PCDM , CANGKU AS CANGKU1, KHLB, KEHU, CANGKU, KUWEI ( NOLOCK ), SHANGPIN LEFT JOIN SHANGPIN_A ON SHANGPIN_A.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM LEFT JOIN GONGHUOSHANG ON SHANGPIN_A.GHSDM= GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM , PINPAI ( NOLOCK ), DALEI ( NOLOCK ), JIJIE ( NOLOCK ), QUDAO ( NOLOCK ), QUYU ( NOLOCK ), FHLX ( NOLOCK ), YUANGONG ( NOLOCK ) WHERE VW_SDPHMX.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM AND VW_SDPHMX.DM1= CANGKU1.CKDM AND KEHU.LBDM = KHLB.LBDM AND KEHU.CKDM= VW_SDPHMX.DM1 AND VW_SDPHMX.DM2= CANGKU.CKDM AND VW_SDPHMX.DM2_1= KUWEI.KWDM AND SHANGPIN.BYZD3= PINPAI.PPDM AND SHANGPIN.BYZD4= DALEI.DLDM AND SHANGPIN.BYZD5= JIJIE.JJDM AND QUDAO.QDDM= VW_SDPHMX.QDDM AND CANGKU1.QYDM= QUYU.QYDM AND VW_SDPHMX.YGDM= YUANGONG.YGDM AND VW_SDPHMX.DM4= FHLX.LXDM AND VW_SDPHMX.RQ BETWEEN '2019-07-23' AND '2019-08-22' GROUP BY VW_SDPHMX.RQ, VW_SDPHMX.DJMC, VW_SDPHMX.DJBH, QUYU.QYMC, QUDAO.QDMC, CANGKU1.CKMC, KEHU.LBDM, KHLB.LBMC, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, FHLX.LXMC, VW_SDPHMX.ZDR, VW_SDPHMX.BZ, VW_SDPHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPDM, SHANGPIN.SPMC, PINPAI.PPMC, DALEI.DLMC, JIJIE.JJMC, SHANGPIN.BYZD8, VW_SDPHMX.CKJ, SHANGPIN.BZSJ, SHANGPIN.PIC, VW_SDPHMX.BYZD7, PICI.PCDM, PICI.PCMC ) AS t1 GROUP BY QDMC, CKMC1, LBDM, LBMC, CKMC, SPDM, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ), datepart( quarter, RQ ), str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), DJMC, DJBH, QYMC, FHMC, YGMC, ZDR, BZ, ZY, SPMC, PPMC, DLMC, JJMC, SPNF, BZSJ, CKJ, PIC, BYZD7, PCDM, PCMC ) AS temp WHERE DJMC = '商店配货单' AND F7 != '.00000000' GROUP BY temp.CKMC, CKMC1 ) AS t2 ORDER BY t2.CKMC
